title: Thursday Sector Laggards: Precious Metals, Advertising Stocks - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, precious metals shares were relative laggards, down on the day by about 4.8%. Helping drag down the group were shares of Alexco Resource, down about 13.7% and shares of Almaden Minerals down about 11.6% on the day.    makeArticleAd();  Also lagging the market Thursday are advertising shares, down on the day by about 1.8% as a group, led down by Meredith, trading lower by about 26.6% and Fluent, trading lower by about 3.9%.
